value.title: Dynamically change chart axis in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick builds on a blog post from Scott Senkeresty to dynamically change the axis of your visual within Power BI. This uses a combination of Power Query and DAX. value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground
